is.iclt.icenlp.core.icetagger
Class IceDisambiguator

java.lang.Object
  is.iclt.icenlp.core.icetagger.IceDisambiguator

public class IceDisambiguator
extends java.lang.Object

A disambiguator for Icelandic text.
Used by the IceTagger class

Author:
Hrafn Loftsson

Method Detail

checkFirstToken

private void checkFirstToken(int from,
                             int to)
Checks the first token of small sentences.
For small sentences there is very probable that the first token is in nominative given that its a noun

Parameters:
from - fromIndex
to - toIndex

checkPastParticiple

private void checkPastParticiple()
Check if a past participle tag is legal.
Not legal if an auxiliary (hafa, gera) is found in the neighborhood.
In that case supine should be the tag.

checkSupine

private void checkSupine()
Checks if a supine tag is legal.
Not legal if an verb be (vera, ver√∞a) is found in the neighborhood.
In that case past participle should be the tag.

checkVerbInfinitiveOrActive

private boolean checkVerbInfinitiveOrActive(int from,

Checks for the existence of an infinitive verb form.

Parameters:
from - fromIndex
to - toIndex
Returns:
true if an infinitive verb form was found

findSentenceSplit

private int findSentenceSplit(int fromIndex)
Find a token that splits the sentence.
Returns the index of the token if found, else -1.

Parameters:
fromIndex - Starting index
Returns:
The index of the token splitting the sentence
